'''Meng''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Papilio Charontis Chapter]], Act I: [[Yet the Butterfly Flutters Away]].

==Profile==
Meng is a relatively new undertaker at the [[Wangsheng Funeral Parlor]]. In [[Yet the Butterfly Flutters Away]], it is revealed that he initially joined so he could ask the director, [[Hu Tao]], to help him search for his deceased childhood friend [[Big G]]. After Big G peacefully moves on, Meng is given unpaid time off to process his feelings.

===Personality===
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Meng is a man with black hair and brown eyes with facial hair on his chin. He wears Wangsheng Funeral Parlor attire.
